html: The system of checks and balances established by the Founders has preserved our democracy. It is essential that we protect this balance even when it is frustrating or inconvenient.
text: The system of checks and balances established by the Founders has preserved our democracy. It is essential that we protect this balance even when it is frustrating or inconvenient.

html: For these reasons, I support my colleagues in looking for a way to advance President Trump's Border Security Plan while preserving the invaluable concept of separation of powers.
text: For these reasons, I support my colleagues in looking for a way to advance President Trump's Border Security Plan while preserving the invaluable concept of separation of powers.

html: The precedent we set this year might empower a future liberal President to declare emergencies to enact gun control or to address ‘climate emergencies,’ or even to tear down the wall we are building today.
text: The precedent we set this year might empower a future liberal President to declare emergencies to enact gun control or to address ‘climate emergencies,’ or even to tear down the wall we are building today.

html: I commend the President for his efforts to secure our nation's border quickly. However, I have serious reservations as to what the Emergency Declaration might do to the Constitutional principle of checks and balances.
text: I commend the President for his efforts to secure our nation's border quickly. However, I have serious reservations as to what the Emergency Declaration might do to the Constitutional principle of checks and balances.

html: For over 20 years in the House and Senate, I have voted for funds to build more than 600 miles of border structure. The funds currently available to President Trump will allow our country to continue building the border wall in the near term.
text: For over 20 years in the House and Senate, I have voted for funds to build more than 600 miles of border structure. The funds currently available to President Trump will allow our country to continue building the border wall in the near term.

html: Another history-making transplant milestone! Davis Beasley’s heart was giving out, putting strain on his liver causing it also to fail. His only option was a rare heart-liver transplant - performed only 35 other times this year in the U.S. Read his story: http://bit.ly/2QDiZD6 pic.twitter.com/TFzQJMZXOK
text:
Another history-making transplant milestone!
Davis Beasley’s heart was giving out, putting strain on his liver causing it also to fail. His only option was a rare heart-liver transplant - performed only 35 other times this year in the U.S.
Read his story: http://bit.ly/2QDiZD6 pic.twitter.com/TFzQJMZXOK

html: Last cast for anglers to pass the #ModernFish Act before the 115th Congress ends. What's on the line? 11 million saltwater anglers, 440,000 jobs, $63 billion economic impact, millions in conservation funding. html: The FCC has long played a role in supporting broadband deployments to brick-and-mortar healthcare facilities. Today, we build on that work by voting to explore a new Connected Care Pilot Program that would support a new trend in telehealth - towards connected everywhere.
text: The FCC has long played a role in supporting broadband deployments to brick-and-mortar healthcare facilities.  Today, we build on that work by voting to explore a new Connected Care Pilot Program that would support a new trend in telehealth - towards connected everywhere.

text: We welcome long overdue news that Pastor Brunson has been moved from prison to house arrest in #Turkey, but it is not enough.
